Lawful Good: Bahamut: dragon god of good. Bahamut's symbol is a Dragon's head in profile.
Boldrei: goddess of communication and home. Boldrei's symbol is a fire in a stone hearth.
Dol Arrah: goddess of sunlight and honour. Dol Arrah's symbol is a rising sun.
Garl Glittergold: gnome god of trickery and wiles. Garl Glittergold's symbol is a gold nugget.
Heironeous: god of chivalry and war. Heironeous's symbol is a lightning bolt.
Ilmater: god of endurance. Ilmater's symbol is two hands bound at the wrist by a red cord.
Kiri-Jolith: god of honour and war. Kiri-Jolith's symbol is a pair of bison's horns.
Majere: god of meditation and order. Majere's symbol is a copper spider.
Mishakal: goddess of healing. Mishakal's symbol is a blue infinity sign.
Moradin: dwarf god of creation. Moradin's symbol is a hammer and anvil.
Paladine: god of rulers and guardians. Paladine's symbol is a silver triangle.
Pholtus: god of light and law. Pholtus' symbol is a silver sun, or a full moon partially eclipsed by a smaller crescent moon.
Rao: god of peace and reason. Rao's symbol is a white heart.
Solinari: goddess of good magic. Solinari's symbol is a white circle, or sphere.
The Silver Flame: deity of protection and good. The symbol of The Silver Flame is a flame drawn on silver, or moulded from silver.
Torm: god of courage and self-sacrifice. Torm's symbol is a white right gauntlet.
Tyr: god, representing justice and heroism. Tyr's symbol is a pair of balanced scales resting on a warhammer. He is based on the Norse deity Týr.
Ulaa: goddess of hills and mountains. Ulaa's symbol is a mountain with a circle at its heart.
Yondalla: halfling goddess of fertility and protection. Yondalla's symbol is a shield.
Neutral Good: Arawai: goddess of fertility. Arawai's symbol is a sheaf of wheat tied with a green ribbon.
Branchala: god of music. Branchala's symbol is a bard's harp.
Chauntea: goddess of agriculture. Chauntea's symbol is a sheaf of grain, or a blooming rose over grain.
Deneir: god of writing. Deneir's symbol is a lit candle above an open eye.
Ehlonna: goddess of woodlands. Ehlonna's symbol is a unicorn horn.
Eldath: goddess of peace. Eldath's symbol is a waterfall plunging into a still pool.
Fharlanghn: god of horizons and exploration. Fharlanghn's symbol is a circle crossed by a curved horizon line.
Habbakuk: god of animal life and the sea. Habbakuk's symbol is a blue bird.
Lathander: god of birth and renewal. Lathander's symbol is a road travelling into a sunrise.
Mielikki: goddess of forests. Mielikki's symbol is a unicorn's head.
Mystra: goddess of magic. Mystra's symbol is a circle of seven stars, or nine stars encircling a flowing red mist, or a single star.
Olladra: goddess of good fortune. Olladra's symbol is a domino.
Onatar: god of craft. Onatar's symbol is a crossed hammer and tongs.
Pelor: god of the sun and healing. Pelor's symbol is a sun.
The Undying Court: elven ancestors. The symbol of The Undying Court is a stylised skull.
Choatic Good: Corellon Larethian: elf deity of art and magic. Corellon Larethian's symbol is a quarter moon, or sunburst.
Deep Sashelas: elf god of the sea. Deep Sashelas' symbol is a dolphin.
Dol Dorn: god of strength at arms. Dol Dorn's symbol is a longsword crossed over a shield.
Kord: god of athletics and sport. Kord's symbol is four spears and four maces, radiating from a central point.
Lliira: goddess of joy. Lliira's symbol is a triangle of three six-pointed stars.
Rillifane Rallathil: wood elf god of nature. Rillifane Rallathil's symbol is an oak tree.
Sehanine Moonbow: elf goddess of the moon. Sehanine Moonbow's symbol is a crescent moon.
Selûne: goddess of the moon. Selûne's symbol is a pair of eyes surrounded by seven stars.
Sune: goddess of love and beauty. Sune's symbol is the face of a beautiful red-haired woman.
The Spirits of the Past: elven ancestors. The symbol of The Spirits of the Past varies.
Trithereon: god of liberty and retribution. Trithereon's symbol is a triskelion.
Tymora: goddess of good fortune and adventure. Tymora's symbol is a face-up coin.
Lawful Neutral: Aureon: god of law and knowledge. Aureon's symbol is an open tome.
Azuth: god of wizards. Azuth's symbol is a left hand pointing upward, outlined in fire.
Helm: god of protection. Helm's symbol is a staring eye on an upright left gauntlet.
Kelemvor: god of the dead. Kelemvor's symbol is an upright skeletal arm holding balanced scales.
Saint Cuthbert: god of common sense and zeal. Saint Cuthbert's symbol is a circle at the centre of starburst lines.
Savras: god of divination and fate. Savras' symbol is a crystal ball containing many kinds of eyes.
The Blood of Vol: philosophy of immortality and undeath. The symbol of The Blood of Vol is a stylised dragon skull on a red teardrop gem.
The Path of Light: philosophy of light and self-improvement. The symbol of The Path of Light is a brilliant crystal.
Wee Jas: goddess of magic and death. Wee Jas' symbol is a red skull in front of a fireball.
True Neutral: Balinor: god of beasts and the hunt. Balinor's symbol is a pair of antlers.
Beory: goddess of nature. Beory's symbol is a green disk.
Boccob: god of magic. Boccob's symbol is an eye within a pentagram.
Celestian: god of stars and wanderers. Celestian's symbol is an arc of seven stars inside a circle.
Chislev: goddess of nature. Chislev's symbol is a feather.
Eadro: merfolk deity of the sea. Eadro's symbol is a spiral design.
Gilean: god of knowledge. Gilean's symbol is an open book.
Gond: god of craft. Gond's symbol is a cog with four spokes.
Istus: goddess of fate and destiny. Istus' symbol is a weaver's spindle with three strands.
Kol Korran: god of trade and wealth. Kol Korran's symbol is a nine-sided gold coin.
Lunitari: goddess of neutral magic. Lunitari's symbol is a red circle, or sphere.
Obad-Hai: god of nature. Obad-Hai's symbol is an oak leaf and acorn.
Oghma: god of knowledge. Oghma's symbol is a blank scroll.
Reorx: god of craft. Reorx's symbol is a forging hammer.
Semuanya: lizardfolk deity of survival. Semuanya's sumbol is an egg.
Shinare: goddess of wealth and trade. Shinare's symbol is a griffon's wing.
Silvanus: god of wild nature. Silvanus' symbol is an oak leaf.
Sirrion: god of fire and change. Sirrion's symbol is multi-coloured fire.
Skerrit: centaur and satyr god of nature. Skerrit's symbol is an oak growing from an acorn.
Skoraeus Stonebones: god of stone giants and art. Skoraeus Stonebones' symbol is a stalactite.
Tempus: god of war. Tempus' symbol is an upright flaming sword.
Waukeen: goddess of trade. Waukeen's symbol is an upright coin with Waukeen's profile facing left.
Zivilyn: god of wisdom. Zivilyn's symbol is a great green, or gold tree.
Chaotic Neutral: Mask: god of thieves. Mask's symbol is a black mask.
Olidammara: god of revelry. Olidammara's symbol is a laughing mask.
Ralishaz: god of ill luck and insanity. Ralishaz's symbol is three, bone fate-casting sticks.
The Traveler: deity of chaos and change. The Traveler's symbol is four crossed, rune-inscribed bones.
Liera: goddess of illusion. Liera's symbol is a triangle, pointing down, containing a swirl of mist.
Lawful Evil: Bane: god of tyranny. Bane's symbol is a black right hand, thumb and fingers together.
Chemosh: god of the undead. Chemosh's symbol is a yellow skull.
Hextor: god of war and discord. Hextor's symbol is six arrows facing downwards in a fan.
Kurtulmak: kobold god of war and mining. Kurtulmak's symbol is a gnome skull.
Loviatar: goddess of pain. Loviatar's symbol is a nine-tailed barbed scourge.
Maglubiyet: goblinoid god of war. Maglubiyet's symbol is a bloody axe.
Nuitari: god of evil magic. Nuitari's symbol is a black circle, or sphere.
Sargonnas: god of vengeance and fire. Sargonnas' symbol is a stylized red condor.
Sekolah: sahuagin god of the hunt. Sekolah's symbol is a shark.
Surtr: god of fire giants and craft. Surtr's symbol is a flaming sword.
Takhisis: goddess of night and hatred. Takhisis' symbol is a black crescent.
Tiamat: dragon goddess of evil. Tiamat's symbol is a dragon head with five claw marks.
Neutral Evil: Auril: goddess of winter. Auril's symbol is a six-pointed snowflake.
Bhaal: god of murder. Bhaal's symbol is a skull surrounded by a ring of blood droplets.
Blibdoolpoolp: kuo-toa goddess. Blibdoolpoolp's symbol is a lobster head in profile.
Cults of the Dragon Below: deities of madness. The symbol of The Cults of the Dragon Below is a stylised dragon skull.
Incabulos: god of plague and famine. Incabulos' symbol is a reptilian eye with a horizontal diamond.
Morgion: god of disease and secrecy. Morgion's symbol is a hood with two red eyes.
Myrkul: god of death. Myrkul's symbol is a white human skull.
Nerull: god of death. Nerull's symbol is a skull with either a sickle or scythe.
Shar: goddess of darkness and loss. Shar's symbol is a black disk encircled with a border.
The Devourer: god of nature's wrath. The Devourer's symbol is a bundle of five sharpened bones.
The Fury: goddess of wrath and madness.The Fury's symbol is a winged wyrm with a woman's head and upper body.
The Keeper: god of greed and death. The Keeper's symbol is a dragonshard stone in the shape of a fang.
The Mockery: god of violence and treachery. The Mockery's symbol is five blood-splattered tools.
Vecna: god of evil secrets. Vecna's symbol is a hand with an eye in its palm.
Chaotic Evil: Beshaba: goddess of misfortune. Beshaba's symbol is a pair of black antlers.
Cyric: god of lies. Cyric's symbol is a jawless white skull on a purple or black sunburst.
Erythnul: god of envy and slaughter. Erythnul's symbol is a single blood drop.
Grolantor: hill giant god of war. Grolantor's symbol is a wooden club.
Gruumsh: orc god of storms and war. Gruumsh's symbol is an unblinking eye.
Hiddukel: god of lies and greed. Hiddukel's symbol is a pair of broken merchant's scales.
Hruggek: bugbear god of violence. Hruggek's symbol is a morning star.
Iuz: god of pain and oppression. Iuz's symbol is a grinning human skull.
Laogzed: troglodyte god of hunger. Laogzed's symbol is an image of the lizard/toad god.
Lolth: drow goddess of spiders. Lolth's symbol is a spider.
Malar: god of the hunt. Malar's symbol is a clawed paw.
Talona: goddess of disease and poison. Talona's symbol is three tear drops on a triangle.
Talos: god of storms. Talos' symbol is three lightning bolts radiating from a central point.
Tharizdun: god of eternal darkness. Tharizdun's symbol is a dark spiral, or inverted ziggurat.
The Shadow: god of dark magic. The Shadow's symbol is an obsidian tower.
Thrym: god of frost giants and strength. Thrym's symbol is a white double-bladed axe.
Umberlee: goddess of the sea. Umberlee's symbol is a wave curling left and right.
Zeboim: goddess of the sea and storms. Zeboim's symbol is a turtle shell.
